Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_close_3D_provider

The function AIL_close_3D_provider closes the specified M3D provider.

void AIL_close_3D_provider(
  HPROVIDER m3d
);

In Parameters

m3d
indicates the M3D provider to close.

Discussion

You must always close an M3D provider that was opened successfully.

Example files that use this function: EXAM3D.C


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_open_3D_provider
Related Basic Types: HPROVIDER, void
Related FAQs: I get a crash when I call AIL_digital_handle_release while the 3D digital API is playing - what's going on?
